Stingtra: What? What is it?

*Stingtra asks Windfire*
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: Talon Harvilicz 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Frida=
y, July 28, 2000 5:50 PM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  Wildfire: 




  Wil=
dfire shot the image of a roaring fire at KitKat to fight off her rage. Tha=
t image was her threat in return. 

  All right! she shouted back. I do som=
ething for your presious little snake-bot! She turned her head back to Quic=
kstrike and made a growling noise. Who were these females, his herum? 

  S=
he scooted closer to the odd little bot, and settled deep into his mind, th=
rowing aside the blanknes that he had. There was something behind that wall=
. She got horible images. A dragon, fire, hatred, a killing passion--- 

  =
Wildfire hissed and backed up. She broke the transfer. 

  Little fool!
